      public void closeDatabaseConnection() throws SQLException

      Throws:
      SQLException - when the close fails for any reason

    • insertPatientInDatabase

      public int insertPatientInDatabase(Patient p) throws Exception
      This method adds a Patient to the Database if it doesn't already exist in the database, when it already exists the entry is updated
      Parameters:
      p - Patient to be added to / updated on Database
      Returns:
      the number of lines effected in the Database
      Throws:
      Exception - when an SQLException occurs or the connection with the database is not initialised

      public Patient selectPatientId(int svnr) throws Exception
      Returns a Patient with the given SVNR
      Parameters:
      svnr - the SVNR of the Patient to be returned
      Returns:
      null if the SVNR does not exist, a Patient if the SVNR is Valid
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong
